title: Mickey Mouse Spoke For The First Time 86 Years Ago Today
teaser: When Mickey first hit the silver screen, he was quiet as the proverbial mouse. He was an instant success, and Disney decided to give him a voice. He first spoke in an animated short film called The Karnival Kid. What were Mickey's first words?
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
